mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `data_log_account` (equipment_id, user_id, create_date,`action`, action_resource, action_result, remark, ip, ip_address, equipment_version, equipment_system, equipment_system_version) VALUES (#{dataLog.equipmentId}, #{dataLog.userId}, #{dataLog.createDate},#{dataLog.action}, #{dataLog.actionResource}, #{dataLog.actionResult}, #{dataLog.remark}, #{dataLog.ip}, #{dataLog.ipAddress}, #{dataLog.equipmentVersion}, #{dataLog.equipmentSystem}, #{dataLog.equipmentSystemVersion});
